title: Action and Environment in exercise of the powers conferred on them by section
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Appointment of Special Advisers
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Appointment of Special Advisers 
(Minister for Communications, Climate Action and Environment) Order 2020.
text_norm: 1 order may cited appointment special adviser (minister communication climate action environment) order 2020

title: Action and Environment in exercise of the powers conferred on them by section
heading: 2. The following persons, particulars of whose addresses have been
text_raw:
2. The following persons, particulars of whose addresses have been 
deposited at the Department of Communications, Climate Action and 
Environment, are appointed to be special advisers to the Minister for 
Communications, Climate Action and Environment: 

(a) 

John McDonald, with effect from 29 June 2020; 

(b) Paul Kenny and Margaret Ward, with effect from 8 July 2020. 

GIVEN under the Official Seal of the Government, 

22 September, 2020. 

MICHEÁL MARTIN, 

Taoiseach. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 13th October, 2020. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [426] 3
